fields.name: FunctionAppResourceId
fields.description: The azure resource id of the function app.

fields.name: FunctionName
fields.description: The function name in the function app.

fields.name: HTTPTriggerUrl
fields.description: The http trigger url where http request sent to.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the azure function receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

fields.name: UseCommonAlertSchema
fields.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.
